FuncDef: The display remote interface command displays information about a specified port extension interface on a master.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a port extension interface.
-

Specifies the type and number of a port extension interface.
-

Examples: Route Port,The Maximum Transmit Unit is 1500
IP Sending Frames' Format is PKTFMT_ETHNT_2, Hardware address is 00e0-fc12-3456
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In port extension scenarios, you can run the display remote interface command to view information about a master's port extension interface for an AP's external communication interface so that the status of the AP's external communication interface can be monitored on the master.
Prerequisites
A port extension interface has been created for an AP's external communication interface on a master.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
